directions: Heat butter in a skillet over medium heat; cook and stir onion until tender, 5 to 10 minutes. Add ground beef; cook and stir until beef is browned and crumbly, 5 to 10 minutes.
Combine water, cabbage, tomato puree, tomato soup, rice, beef bouillon, salt, and pepper in a slow cooker; add ground beef mixture.
ingredients: 1 head cabbage, cut into bite-size pieces
salt and ground black pepper to taste
title: Lazy Golumpki (Stuffed Cabbage) Soup
